alert.note: Alert for Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:36AM CDT until June 15 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL NEWTON AND NORTHERN LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 635 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marion, or 8 miles northeast of Meridian, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Toomsuba and Lauderdale around 640 AM CDT. Kewanee around 645 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
